submission:
class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, arr: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        ans = 0
        n = len(arr)
        dp = [0]*n
        cnt = Counter() # 维护当前的与和
        for i, x in enumerate(arr):
            cnt[x] += 1
            j = i - 1
            while j >= 0 and arr[j] & x != arr[j]:
                cnt[arr[j]]-=1
                arr[j] &= x
                cnt[arr[j]]+=1
                j -= 1
            ans += cnt[k]
        return ans
